name: Baby Hazel: Rabbit Sitter
description: Hey darlings! Are you ready to go on a new fabulous adventure with baby Hazel? She's so excited and eager to show you what she found. While she was playing outside with her friends, she found a cute little baby rabbit in the mud and decided to take care of him. The only problem is that she's never had a pet rabbit before. Do you think you can help this cutie take care of Honey Bunny? Give the little ball of fluffy cuteness a bath and make sure he's clean and happy. You'll surely have a blast taking care of this adorable pet!
